item.description:
Learn how we can defeat this insidious attack on our Constitution and unalienable rights known as: NDAA.

 

"Blake Filippi is an historian, attorney, cattle rancher, and the founder of the Rhode Island Liberty Coalition. The Rhode Island Liberty Coalition has drafted and published the model NDAA nullification legislation which now spreads throughout the country.

The legislation: 1) Acts as a resolution condemning the section 1021 of the NDAA, 2) Directs all local officials to not cooperate with a military investigation or detainment of United States Citizens and legal resident aliens, and 3) Attempts to outlaw such investigations and detainments. The legislation can be used to petition any state, municipal or county government in the United States.

Blake Filippi pledges to always defend and protect the Rhode Island and United States Constitutions and is honored to speak before "Oath-Keepers.” Go to: "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" on facebook or oathkeepers.org for more info. "Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson 401-952-5015
item.name: Indefinite detention without charges? Guest Speaker, Blake Filippi on NDAA
